span.a: PDF File NOTICE OF CANCELLATION OF BOARD COMMITTEE MEETING

div.div: APS Continuity of Learning Plan Letter

div.p: Please see the link below for a letter from Superintendent Donalynn Ingersoll for more information regarding Alma Public School's Continuity of Learning Plan for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year as well as the plan for picking up items left at school.

div.div: Notice of change in time of regular board mtg APRIL 2020

span.a: PDF File Notice of change in time of regular board mtg APRIL 2020

div.p: With school buildings being closed, we will not be able to hold our traditional Kindergarten Registration on April 16th at Luce Road.
We are in the process of developing a new plan for Kindergarten Registration. As soon as we have it figured out, we will communicate it with families. Thanks for your patience. 😊
